name: Aircrafty Duo
description:
This is an entry for the Mix and Game Jam 2020.

The game features two playable characters, a live alien saucer and its scietist liberator, as they try to escape from the military and alien forces that want to capture/annihilate them.

The game tries to mix Run-n-gun and SHMUP gameplay together, taking control of both escapees as you shoot through the defenses and find the goal. 

Controls:

WAD keys: Move Scientist

Up, Left, Right keys: Move Saucer

Credits:

Programming: Night Shyne

Art and Animation: InkiCrow
